src:
経理担当の男、総額２億５千万円着服か「大半はキャバクラに使った」

07 Nov 2019, 03:39

　会社の資金を着服したとして、警視庁は７日、千葉県船橋市印内、会社員中島圭一容疑者（４９）を業務上横領容疑で逮捕したと発表した。逮捕は６日。
　発表によると、中島容疑者は東京都墨田区の電気設備会社の経理担当だった２０１３年～１５年６月、会社の口座からインターネットバンキングを使って計約１億４３００万円を自分の口座に送金し、着服した疑い。容疑を認め、「大半はキャバクラに使った」と供述している。
　１７年に東京国税局の税務調査で不正が発覚し、懲戒解雇された。警視庁は、着服総額は約２億５０００万円に上るとみている。
text:
A man in charge of accounting, wearing a total of 250 million yen or “most used for cabaret club”

07 Nov 2019, 03:39

“The Metropolitan Police Department announced that it has arrested Suichi Nakajima (49), a member of the office in Funabashi City, Chiba Prefecture, for allegedly embezzling on the job. Arrested on the 6th.
According to the announcement, Mr. Nakajima, who was in charge of accounting for an electrical equipment company in Sumida-ku, Tokyo, in 2013 to June 2015, made a total of about 143 million yen from his company account to his account using Internet banking. Suspected of sending money and dressing. He admits the charges and states that "the majority was used for cabaret."
In 2005, fraud was discovered in a tax investigation by the Tokyo Taxation Bureau and was dismissed from disciplinary action. The Metropolitan Police Department expects the total amount of clothes to be about 250 million yen.
